definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

sentences.chinese: 今天我拍賣的是維尼熊。

sentences.english: Tired of trying, and stuck fast, she looked as silly as Winnie the Pooh with his head in the honey pot.
sentences.chinese: 她的窘樣看上去跟維尼熊把腦袋卡在蜜罐裏有得一拼。

sentences.english: Right my little pooh bear, wanna take a chance?
sentences.chinese: 我的小維尼熊想冒個險嗎？
